activities.name: ExitCsvFile
activities.description: 処理対象のフォルダに CSV ファイルが存在する場合にのみ後続の処理を実行します。

ifTrueActivities.name: DeleteInsertCsvDataAndGroupByFileName
ifTrueActivities.description: CSV ファイルから読み込んだデータを DELETE INSERT します

scripts.text:
BEGIN TRY
		
	BEGIN TRANSACTION;

	-- 対象テーブルの内、年月が前月、当月、来月、当月より 2 年前のデータのみ削除
	DELETE FROM backlog
	WHERE
		system_date IN
		(
			SELECT
				system_date
			FROM
				temp_backlog
			GROUP BY
			    system_date
		)
		OR
		system_date <= FORMAT(DATEADD(YEAR, -2, GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Tokyo Standard Time'), 'yyyyMM');

	-- CSV ファイルから読み込んだデータを対象テーブルに INSERT
	INSERT INTO backlog
	(
		system_date,
		sales_id,
		line_num,
		voucher_type,
		cust_account,
		cust_short_name,
		sales_ship_to_account_num,
		sales_ship_to_short_name,
		cust_collections,
		sales_cust_collection_short_name,
		sales_vend_account_num,
		sales_vend_name_alias,
		sales_office,
		sales_office_name,
		sales_group,
		sales_group_name,
		sales_end_user_account_num,
		sales_end_user_short_name,
		invoice_account,
		sales_invoice_short_name,
		sales_invoice_name,
		sales_person,
		sales_person_name,
		sales_consumer,
		carrier_cd,
		carrier_name_alias,
		item_id,
		item_name,
		pack_style_name,
		shipping_name_code,
		shipping_name,
		trade_mark_code,
		trade_mark_name,
		sales_item_class_code,
		sales_item_class_name,
		product_item_group_code,
		product_item_group_name,
		sales_item_group_code,
		sales_item_group_name,
		invent_site_id,
		invent_site_name,
		invent_location_id,
		invent_location_name,
		contract_unit_qty,
		contract_unit_price_uom,
		sales_qty,
		sales_unit,
		sales_amount,
		invoice_contract_unit_qty,
		invoice_contract_unit_price_uom,
		invoice_amount,
		invoice_additional_costs,
		backlog_amount,
		accounting_currency,
		invoice_date,
		processing_date,
		created_by,
		created_date_time,
		shipping_date_requested,
		receipt_date_requested
	)
	SELECT
		system_date,
		sales_id,
		line_num,
		voucher_type,
		cust_account,
		cust_short_name,
		sales_ship_to_account_num,
		sales_ship_to_short_name,
		cust_collections,
		sales_cust_collection_short_name,
		sales_vend_account_num,
		sales_vend_name_alias,
		sales_office,
		sales_office_name,
		sales_group,
		sales_group_name,
		sales_end_user_account_num,
		sales_end_user_short_name,
		invoice_account,
		sales_invoice_short_name,
		sales_invoice_name,
		sales_person,
		sales_person_name,
		sales_consumer,
		carrier_cd,
		carrier_name_alias,
		item_id,
		item_name,
		pack_style_name,
		shipping_name_code,
		shipping_name,
		trade_mark_code,
		trade_mark_name,
		sales_item_class_code,
		sales_item_class_name,
		product_item_group_code,
		product_item_group_name,
		sales_item_group_code,
		sales_item_group_name,
		invent_site_id,
		invent_site_name,
		invent_location_id,
		invent_location_name,
		contract_unit_qty,
		contract_unit_price_uom,
		sales_qty,
		sales_unit,
		sales_amount,
		invoice_contract_unit_qty,
		invoice_contract_unit_price_uom,
		invoice_amount,
		invoice_additional_costs,
		backlog_amount,
		accounting_currency,
		invoice_date,
		processing_date,
		created_by,
		created_date_time,
		shipping_date_requested,
		receipt_date_requested
	FROM
		temp_backlog

	COMMIT TRANSACTION;

END TRY

BEGIN CATCH

	ROLLBACK TRANSACTION;

	-- ADF に異常終了を伝えるため
	THROW;

END CATCH

ifTrueActivities.name: TruncateMiddelTableAfterCsvFileDelete
ifTrueActivities.description:
中間テーブルのテーブルデータを全削除します。
次のアクティビティで CSV ファイルを削除します。

scripts.text:
BEGIN TRY

    -- 中間テーブルに格納されているデータを削除
    TRUNCATE TABLE temp_backlog;

END TRY

BEGIN CATCH

	-- ADF に異常終了を伝えるため
	THROW;

END CATCH

ifTrueActivities.name: TruncateMiddelTableNotAfterCsvFileDelete
ifTrueActivities.description:
中間テーブルのテーブルデータを全削除します。
次のアクティビティで CSV ファイルを削除しません

scripts.text:
BEGIN TRY

    -- 中間テーブルに格納されているデータを削除
    TRUNCATE TABLE temp_backlog

END TRY

BEGIN CATCH

	-- ADF に異常終了を伝えるため
	THROW;

END CATCH

ifTrueActivities.name: DeleteCsvFile
ifTrueActivities.description: 対象のフォルダ配下に存在するアイテムの内、プレフィックスが "backlog_" の CSV ファイルのみ削除します。

ifTrueActivities.name: CsvDataInMiddleTable
ifTrueActivities.description: CSV ファイルから読み込んだデータを cache に保存します。

activities.name: TruncateMiddelTableIfExitMiddelTableData
activities.description: 中間テーブルにレコードが存在する場合にのみ、中間テーブルのテーブルデータを全削除します。

scripts.text:
BEGIN TRY

    DECLARE @RecordCount INT;

	SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(sales_id)
	FROM temp_backlog;

	-- 中間テーブルにレコードが存在する場合
	IF @RecordCount > 0
	BEGIN
		-- 中間テーブルに格納されているデータを削除
		TRUNCATE TABLE temp_backlog;
	END

END TRY

BEGIN CATCH

	-- ADF に異常終了を伝えるため
	THROW;

END CATCH

scripts.text:
BEGIN TRY
		
	BEGIN TRANSACTION;

	-- 対象テーブルの内、年月が前月、当月、来月、当月より 2 年前のデータのみ削除
	DELETE FROM budget
	WHERE
		processing_date IN
		(
			SELECT
				processing_date
			FROM
				temp_budget
			GROUP BY
			    processing_date
		)
		OR
		processing_date <= FORMAT(DATEADD(YEAR, -2, GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Tokyo Standard Time'), 'yyyyMM');

	-- CSV ファイルから読み込んだデータを対象テーブルに INSERT
	INSERT INTO budget
	(
		sales_id,
	    voucher_type,
	    processing_date,
	    sales_office,

	    sales_group,
	    sales_group_name,

	    gross_profit,

	    sales_unit_price,
	    billing_qty_inventory_unit,
	    fare,
	    purchase_unit_price,
	    direct_selling_costs,
	    billing_price,
	    variable_costs,
	    shipment_qty,
	    billing_qty,
	    purchase_price,
	    actual_cost,
	    sales_volume,
	    sales_price,
	    transportation_cost,
	    fixed_costs,
	    created_date_time,
	    billing_date,
	    sales_document_details,
	    voucher_type_name,
	    customer_cd,
	    customer_short_name,
	    sales_ship_to_account_num,
	    sales_ship_to_short_name,
	    sales_end_user_account_num,
	    sales_end_user_short_name,
	    invoice_account,
	    sales_invoice_short_name,
	    payer_cd,
	    payer_short_name,
	    sales_person,
	    sales_person_name,
	    carrier_cd,
	    carrier_name_alias,
	    oem_cd,
	    oem_name,

	    trade_mark_name,
	    sales_item_class_cd,

	    product_item_group_cd,
	    product_item_group_name,
	    invent_site_id,
	    invent_site_name,
	    shipping_point,
	    shipping_point_name,
	    specified_delivery_date,
	    delivery_date,
	    estimated_ship_date,
	    shipment_posting_date,
	    purchase_order_document,
	    billing_document,
	    registrant,
	    sales_organization,
	    sales_organization_name,
	    distribution_channels,
	    distribution_channels_name,
	    product_department,
	    product_department_name,
	    purchase_currency,
	    sales_unit,
	    base_unit,
	    condition_unit,
	    shipping_unit_of_measure,
	    billing_unit_of_measure,
	    inventory_unit,
	    direct_selling_costs_excl_fare,
	    registration_time
	)
	SELECT
		sales_id,
	    voucher_type,
	    processing_date,
	    sales_office,
	    sales_office_name,
	    sales_group,
	    sales_group_name,
	    sales_consumer,
	    sales_item_group_cd,
	    sales_item_group_name,
	    item_id,
	    item_name,
	    sales_qty,
	    sales_amount,
	    marginal_profit,
	    gross_profit,
	    accounting_currency,
	    shipping_name_cd,
	    shipping_name,
	    sales_unit_price,
	    billing_qty_inventory_unit,
	    fare,
	    purchase_unit_price,
	    direct_selling_costs,
	    billing_price,
	    variable_costs,
	    shipment_qty,
	    billing_qty,
	    purchase_price,
	    actual_cost,
	    sales_volume,
	    sales_price,
	    transportation_cost,
	    fixed_costs,
	    created_date_time,
	    billing_date,
	    sales_document_details,
	    voucher_type_name,
	    customer_cd,
	    customer_short_name,
	    sales_ship_to_account_num,
	    sales_ship_to_short_name,
	    sales_end_user_account_num,
	    sales_end_user_short_name,
	    invoice_account,
	    sales_invoice_short_name,
	    payer_cd,
	    payer_short_name,
	    sales_person,
	    sales_person_name,
	    carrier_cd,
	    carrier_name_alias,
	    oem_cd,
	    oem_name,
	    sales_vend_account_num,
	    sales_vend_name_alias,
	    pack_style_name,
	    trade_mark_cd,
	    trade_mark_name,
	    sales_item_class_cd,
	    sales_item_class_name,
	    product_item_group_cd,
	    product_item_group_name,
	    invent_site_id,
	    invent_site_name,
	    shipping_point,
	    shipping_point_name,
	    specified_delivery_date,
	    delivery_date,
	    estimated_ship_date,
	    shipment_posting_date,
	    purchase_order_document,
	    billing_document,
	    registrant,
	    sales_organization,
	    sales_organization_name,
	    distribution_channels,

	    billing_unit_of_measure,
	    inventory_unit,
	    direct_selling_costs_excl_fare,
	    registration_time
	FROM

	COMMIT TRANSACTION;

END TRY

ifTrueActivities.name: DeleteCsvFile

ifTrueActivities.description: CSV ファイルから読み込んだデータを中間テーブルに保存します。

activities.name: TruncateMiddelTableIfExitMiddelTableData
activities.description: 中間テーブルにレコードが存在する場合にのみ、中間テーブルのテーブルデータを全削除します。

scripts.text:
BEGIN TRY

    DECLARE @RecordCount INT;

	SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(sales_id)
	FROM temp_budget;

	-- 中間テーブルにレコードが存在する場合
	IF @RecordCount > 0
	BEGIN
		-- 中間テーブルに格納されているデータを削除
		TRUNCATE TABLE temp_budget;
	END

END TRY

BEGIN CATCH

	-- ADF に異常終了を伝えるため
	THROW;

END CATCH

ifTrueActivities.name: DeleteInsertCsvDataAndGroupByFileName
ifTrueActivities.description: 削除対象のファイル名をグループ化します。

scripts.text:
BEGIN TRY
		
	BEGIN TRANSACTION;

	-- 対象テーブルの内、日時が当月のデータのみ削除
	DELETE FROM order_received_rest
	WHERE
		process_date = 
		(
			SELECT
				process_date
			FROM
				OPENJSON(@csvDataJson)
				WITH (
					process_date CHAR(6)
				)
			GROUP BY process_date
		);	

	-- CSV ファイルから読み込んだデータを対象テーブルに INSERT
	INSERT INTO order_received_rest
	(
		process_date,
		sales_order,
		detail_row_number,
		slip_type,
		client,
		abbreviation,
		shipping_destination,
		shipping_destination_abbreviation,
		collection_destination_id,
		collection_destination_abbreviation,
		supplier,
		supplier_search_name,
		sales_office,
		sales_office_name,
		sales_office_group,
		sales_office_group_name,
		customer,
		customer_abbreviation,
		billing_address_or_old_id,
		billing_address_abbreviation,
		billing_address_name,
		sales_person,
		sales_person_name,
		consumer,
		carrier,
		carrier_search_name,
		item_number,
		text,
		packing_style_name,
		shipping_name_code,
		shipping_destination_name,
		trademark_code,
		trademark_name,
		goods_big_classification_code,
		goods_big_classification_name,
		product_group_code,
		product_group_name,
		goods_group_code,
		goods_group_name,
		site,
		site_name,
		warehouse,
		warehouse_name,
		contract_unit_quantity,
		contract_price_unit,
		sale_quantity,
		sale_unit,
		sale_amount,
		invoice_contract_unit_quantity,
		invoice_contract_price_unit,
		invoice_amount,
		invoice_mimscellaneous_expenses,
		orders_remaining_amount,
		accountant_currency,
		invoice_recording_date,
		sorting_date,
		author,
		create_at,
		shipping_scheduled_date,
		arrival_desired_date
	)
	SELECT
		process_date,
		sales_order,
		detail_row_number,
		slip_type,
		client,
		abbreviation,
		shipping_destination,
		shipping_destination_abbreviation,
		collection_destination_id,
		collection_destination_abbreviation,
		supplier,
		supplier_search_name,
		sales_office,
		sales_office_name,
		sales_office_group,
		sales_office_group_name,
		customer,
		customer_abbreviation,
		billing_address_or_old_id,
		billing_address_abbreviation,
		billing_address_name,
		sales_person,
		sales_person_name,
		consumer,
		carrier,
		carrier_search_name,
		item_number,
		text,
		packing_style_name,
		shipping_name_code,
		shipping_destination_name,
		trademark_code,
		trademark_name,
		goods_big_classification_code,
		goods_big_classification_name,
		product_group_code,
		product_group_name,
		goods_group_code,
		goods_group_name,
		site,
		site_name,
		warehouse,
		warehouse_name,
		contract_unit_quantity,
		contract_price_unit,
		sale_quantity,
		sale_unit,
		sale_amount,
		invoice_contract_unit_quantity,
		invoice_contract_price_unit,
		invoice_amount,
		invoice_mimscellaneous_expenses,
		orders_remaining_amount,
		accountant_currency,
		invoice_recording_date,
		sorting_date,
		author,
		create_at,
		shipping_scheduled_date,
		arrival_desired_date
	FROM
		OPENJSON(@csvDataJson)
		WITH
		(
			process_date CHAR(6),
			sales_order VARCHAR(20),
			detail_row_number REAL,
			slip_type NVARCHAR(10),
			client CHAR(20),
			abbreviation NVARCHAR(40),
			shipping_destination CHAR(20),
			shipping_destination_abbreviation NVARCHAR(40),
			collection_destination_id CHAR(20),
			collection_destination_abbreviation NVARCHAR(40),
			supplier CHAR(20),
			supplier_search_name NVARCHAR(20),
			sales_office CHAR(4),
			sales_office_name NVARCHAR(60),
			sales_office_group CHAR(3),
			sales_office_group_name NVARCHAR(60),
			customer CHAR(20),
			customer_abbreviation NVARCHAR(40),
			billing_address_or_old_id CHAR(20),
			billing_address_abbreviation NVARCHAR(40),
			billing_address_name NVARCHAR(160),
			sales_person CHAR(20),
			sales_person_name NVARCHAR(250),
			consumer NVARCHAR(MAX),
			carrier CHAR(20),
			carrier_search_name NVARCHAR(20),
			item_number VARCHAR(20),
			text CHAR(20),
			packing_style_name NVARCHAR(100),
			shipping_name_code CHAR(3),
			shipping_destination_name NVARCHAR(40),
			trademark_code VARCHAR(4),
			trademark_name NVARCHAR(40),
			goods_big_classification_code CHAR(2),
			goods_big_classification_name NVARCHAR(100),
			product_group_code CHAR(9),
			product_group_name NVARCHAR(100),
			goods_group_code CHAR(4),
			goods_group_name NVARCHAR(100),
			site CHAR(10),
			site_name NVARCHAR(60),
			warehouse CHAR(10),
			warehouse_name NVARCHAR(60),
			contract_unit_quantity REAL,
			contract_price_unit NVARCHAR(10),
			sale_quantity REAL,
			sale_unit NVARCHAR(10),
			sale_amount REAL,
			invoice_contract_unit_quantity REAL,
			invoice_contract_price_unit NVARCHAR(10),
			invoice_amount REAL,
			invoice_mimscellaneous_expenses REAL,
			orders_remaining_amount REAL,
			accountant_currency VARCHAR(3),
			invoice_recording_date VARCHAR(20),
			sorting_date CHAR(60),
			author VARCHAR(20),
			create_at VARCHAR(40),
			shipping_scheduled_date VARCHAR(20),
			arrival_desired_date VARCHAR(20)
		);

    SELECT
        fileName
    FROM
        OPENJSON(@csvDataJson)
        WITH (
            fileName NVARCHAR(MAX)
        )
    GROUP BY fileName

	COMMIT TRANSACTION;

END TRY

BEGIN CATCH

	ROLLBACK TRANSACTION;

	-- ADF に異常終了を伝えるため
	THROW;

END CATCH

scripts.text:
BEGIN TRY
		
	BEGIN TRANSACTION;

	-- 対象テーブルの内、年月が前月、当月、来月、当月より 2 年前のデータのみ削除
	DELETE FROM plstatement
	WHERE
		billinig_date IN
		(
			SELECT
				billinig_date
			FROM
				temp_plstatement
			GROUP BY
			    billinig_date
		)
		OR
		billinig_date <= FORMAT(DATEADD(YEAR, -2, GETDATE() AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AT TIME ZONE 'Tokyo Standard Time'), 'yyyyMM');

	-- CSV ファイルから読み込んだデータを対象テーブルに INSERT
	INSERT INTO plstatement
	(
		system_date,
	    sales_id,
	    line_num,

	    voucher_type,
	    sales_office,

activities.name: TruncateMiddelTableIfExitMiddelTableData
activities.description: 中間テーブルにレコードが存在する場合にのみ、中間テーブルのテーブルデータを全削除します。

scripts.text:
BEGIN TRY

    DECLARE @RecordCount INT;

	SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(sales_id)
	FROM temp_plstatement;

	-- 中間テーブルにレコードが存在する場合
	IF @RecordCount > 0
	BEGIN
		-- 中間テーブルに格納されているデータを削除
		TRUNCATE TABLE temp_plstatement;
	END

END TRY

BEGIN CATCH

	-- ADF に異常終了を伝えるため
	THROW;

END CATCH

activities.name: DeleteInsertCsvDataAndGroupByFileName
activities.description: 削除対象のファイル名をグループ化します。

scripts.text:
BEGIN TRY
		
	BEGIN TRANSACTION;

	-- 対象テーブルの内、日時が当月のデータのみ削除
	DELETE FROM test_table
	WHERE
		FORMAT(update_at, 'yyyyMM') = 
		(
			SELECT
				REPLACE(LEFT(update_at, 7), '-', '') AS yearManth
			FROM
				OPENJSON(@csvDataJson)
				WITH (
					update_at date
				)
			GROUP BY REPLACE(LEFT(update_at, 7), '-', '')
		);	

	-- CSV ファイルから読み込んだデータを対象テーブルに INSERT
	INSERT INTO test_table(name, age, update_at)
	SELECT
		name,
		age,
		FORMAT(GETDATE(),'yyyy-MM-dd')
	FROM
		OPENJSON(@csvDataJson)
		WITH (
			name NVARCHAR(100),
			age INT
		);

    SELECT
        fileName
    FROM
        OPENJSON(@csvDataJson)
        WITH (
            fileName NVARCHAR(MAX)
        )
    GROUP BY fileName

	COMMIT TRANSACTION;

END TRY

BEGIN CATCH

	ROLLBACK TRANSACTION;

	-- ADF に異常終了を伝えるため
	THROW;

END CATCH

activities.name: Script1
activities.description: feature-furutani-1- から feature-furutani-1 にマージします。

properties.description: test_db_nsw 用のリンクサービス

scriptLines: derivedFileNameColumn assert(expectTrue(!isNull(update_at), false, 'assert1', null, "update_at 列に NULL が存在する場合"),
{営業所グループ名} as string,
{商品大分類コード} as short,
{請求書-契約単位数量} as integer,
{請求書-契約単価単位} as string,
{請求書-台貫金額(諸費用)} as integer,
{請求書-計上日} = toString({請求書-計上日}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
{作成日時} = toString({作成日時}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss'),
{出荷予定日} = toString({出荷予定日}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'),
{入荷希望日} = toString({入荷希望日}, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> derivedFileNameColumn
invoice_mimscellaneous_expenses = {請求書-台貫金額(諸費用)},
joinYearMonth filter(iif(isNull(id), isNull(id), yearMonth == dbYearMonth)) ~> deleteRecordFilter
deleteRecordFilter derive(newUpdateAt = iif(isNull(id), csvUpdate_at, update_at)) ~> derivedNewUpdateAtColumn
joinYearMonth filter(iif(isNull(id), isNull(id), yearMonth == dbYearMonth)) ~> deleteRecordFilter
{商品大分類コード} as string,
{カスタマー台帳削除} as string,
{カスタマー台帳削除理由} as string,
{発注書-行ステータス} as string,
{ピッキング ルート} as string,
{販売注文-行ステータス} as string,
{請求時契約単価数量} as string,
{変動製造費（一物一価）} as string,
{固定製造費（一物一価）} as string,
{契約単価数量} = toDecimal({契約単価数量}, 12, 2),
{請求時数量} = toDecimal({請求時数量}, 12, 2),
{請求時契約単価数量} = toDecimal({請求時契約単価数量}, 12, 2),
{請求時契約単価} = toDecimal({請求時契約単価}, 15, 2),
{請求時正味金額} = toDecimal({請求時正味金額}, 15, 2),
{変動製造費（工場）} = toDecimal({変動製造費（工場）}, 15, 2),
{固定製造費（工場）} = toDecimal({固定製造費（工場）}, 15, 2),
{変動製造費（直納）} = toDecimal({変動製造費（直納）}, 15, 2),
{変動製造費（一物一価）} = toDecimal({変動製造費（一物一価）}, 15, 2),
{固定製造費（一物一価）} = toDecimal({固定製造費（一物一価）}, 15, 2)) ~> toDecimal
customer_delete_reason = {カスタマー台帳削除理由},
picking_route = {ピッキング ルート},
line_status = {販売注文-行ステータス},
{営業グループ名称} as string,
{請求数量（在庫単位）} as string,
{販売伝票タイプ名称-DISPLAY_KEY} as string,
{商品大分類コード-DISPLAY_KEY} as string,
{出荷ポイント名称-DISPLAY_KEY} as string,
{流通チャネル名称-DISPLAY_KEY} as string,
{販売直接費（運賃以外）-DISPLAY_KEY} as string,
csvFileRead derive({売上（基本）数量} = toDecimal({売上（基本）数量}, 12, 2),
{売上（請求金額）} = toDecimal({売上（請求金額）}, 15, 2),
{売上総利益} = toDecimal({売上総利益}, 15, 2),
{請求数量（在庫単位）} = toDecimal({請求数量（在庫単位）}, 12, 2),
{販売直接費} = toDecimal({販売直接費}, 15, 2),
{変動製造費} = toDecimal({変動製造費}, 15, 2),
{固定製造費} = toDecimal({固定製造費}, 15, 2),
{販売直接費（運賃以外）-DISPLAY_KEY} = toDecimal({販売直接費（運賃以外）-DISPLAY_KEY}, 15, 2)) ~> toDecimal
{営業所グループ名} as string,
{商品大分類コード} as string,
{請求書-契約単位数量} as string,
{請求書-契約単価単位} as string,
{請求書-台貫金額(諸費用)} as string,
csvFileRead derive({契約単位数量} = toDecimal({契約単位数量}, 12, 2),
{請求書-契約単位数量} = toDecimal({請求書-契約単位数量}, 12, 2),
{請求書-金額} = toDecimal({請求書-金額}, 15, 2),
{請求書-台貫金額(諸費用)} = toDecimal({請求書-台貫金額(諸費用)}, 15, 2),
{受注残金額} = toDecimal({受注残金額}, 15, 2)) ~> toDecimal
invoice_additional_costs = {請求書-台貫金額(諸費用)},
